name: Lost Moon
description: This is a platform game that challenges you with puzzles, upgrades and action.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8 Processor: 1.0 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Direct X9.0 Compatible Card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: Direct X9.0 Compatible Card Additional Notes: Adobe AIR 17.0 and later
